title: Western | Sabata the Killer (1970) Anthony Steffen, Peter Lee Lawrence | Full Movie

sources.title: Western | Sabata the Killer (1970) Anthony Steffen, Peter Lee Lawrence | Full Movie
sources.description:
Sabata and Mangosta are bank robbers, who after a bank job, through a series of events, end up teaming up with the bank clerk, Peter. They then go on the run with Peter's boss and a hired posse equipped with the latest technology in weapons on their trail.

Original title: Arriva Sabata!

This film is available with English and German audio, and subtitles in many language options.

Director: Tulio Demicheli
Writers: Tulio Demicheli, Florentino Soria, Nino Stresa
Genres: Comedy, Western movie.

Main Cast:
Anthony Steffen as Sabata / Garringo
Peter Lee Lawrence as Peter
Eduardo Fajardo as Mangosta
Alfredo Mayo as Garfield
Luis Induni as Charlie McKenzie
Rossana Rovere as Patricia
Alfonso Rojas as Sheriff
María Villa as Manolita
Cris Huerta as Fuller
José Canalejas as Chaco
Alfredo Santacruz as Butch Garrett
Tito García as Fuller
Lorenzo Robledo as Man in Sheriff's Office
Álvaro de Luna as Garfield Hechman


00:00 Full Spaghetti Western Movie
12:45 Peter encounters Garfield at the bank during a tense negotiation over money.
28:17 Mangosta and his gang ambush travelers on the trail seeking hidden wealth.
43:52 The sheriff and his posse pursue the bandits through the desert landscape.
59:33 Peter and John form an uneasy alliance at Patricia's ranch.
1:15:24 Mangosta reveals his true motives during the fiery confrontation at the hacienda.
1:28:45 The final showdown determines the fate of the stolen fortune.
